item.title: Waste wood dumped on street, 16th October
item.description:
A large pile of (used) wood with nails/screws wrapped in a tarpaulin & dumped onto the street today 16/1/2025. Similar material has been dumped recently, a witness caught the perpetrator & has recorded the vehicle number plate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Manor Way, Abbey Wood, London

item.title: Fire, 16th October
item.description:
Travellers have moved into Mabley Park, right in between the sports club changing facilities and the children’s playground. This afternoon they had created a fire and the smoke billowed right into the children’s playground. Please sort this out.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lee Conservancy Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Covered unattached horse box in Ash Row., 16th October
item.description:
The horse box has been stationary here for some months, and is taking up valuable parking space. The owner appears to live at no.61.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ash Row, Southborough, London

item.title: Flytipping in alleyway and by back gardens in craydene road, 16th October
item.description:
Its been reported on 3 occasions now that there is flytipping in alley between number 40 and 42 craydene road, this also leads round the back of the houses. This has been there for over 2 months ago and more and more people are adding to this. This is causing issues with access and also is a fire hazard. Please can this be looked into urgently and cleared.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Craydene Road, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kerbs full of litter, 16th October
item.description:
The litter is collecting in the kerbside all along both sides of Palace Road. The bromley council website states weekly cleaning along Palace Road but this litter, which includes a used sanitary pad, has been here for three weeks plus.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rodway Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet
